brand.name: Teasers CLE
brand.tagline: Where anticipation is the main course.
brand.mission: Teasers CLE is a Cleveland-based experiential dining and nightlife brand merging fine cuisine, art, and performance into unforgettable sensory experiences.
brand.positioning: Teasers CLE blends the intimacy of a supper club with the visual allure of modern art — a space where dining becomes theater and every event feels like a secret worth sharing.

story.origin: Born from the original Teasers concept, Teasers CLE began as a series of pop-up dinners in underground spaces across Cleveland. Each event teased the senses — dimly lit rooms, curated playlists, and daring tasting menus — until demand transformed it into a full experiential brand.
story.vision: To redefine what dining can be by crafting nights that linger long after the last glass is cleared.

events.name: Velvet Ember
events.description: A night bathed in candlelight and smoke — guests move through five fiery tasting courses paired with live flamenco and molten cocktails.

events.name: The Tasting Room
events.description: Guests are blindfolded as each course arrives — an intimate journey that strips away sight to amplify taste, scent, and sound.

events.name: Mirror Dinner
events.description: A mirrored dining table surrounded by projection art. Every reflection reveals a course inspired by self-perception and sensuality.
events.tagline: Look closer — the story is you.

events.name: Noir Nights
events.description: Dark cocktails, dim jazz, and dishes that play with mystery — each bite conceals a surprise ingredient.
events.tagline: What you can't see is what you'll crave.

events.name: Whisper & Wine
events.description: A sultry wine-pairing night where each course is introduced with a whispered story from the sommelier.

events.name: Eclipse Supper
events.description: Guests dine under a shifting play of light and shadow as courses transition from bright to dark — symbolic of the celestial eclipse.

menu.title: Ember Kiss
menu.description: Charred scallop on smoked salt with habanero honey glaze.

menu.title: Midnight Velvet
menu.description: Cocoa-dusted filet with blackberry reduction and crushed pink peppercorns.

menu.title: The Blind Pour
menu.description: A mystery cocktail unveiled only after you've tasted it — layered spirits with citrus, smoke, and spice.

menu.title: Mirror Martini
menu.description: Crystal-clear vodka cocktail served on reflective glass with edible shimmer.

menu.title: Eclipse Soufflé
menu.description: Dark chocolate soufflé with gold dust and salted caramel core.

press.quote: Teasers CLE is rewriting the city's nightlife — where dinner becomes performance art.
A sensory playground that feels like a dream sequence with flavor notes.
Part culinary experience, part art installation — Teasers CLE is a brand to watch.
